18:32 A lot of things happens at once and their reactions reflects their personalities so well...
Yoongi's tiny smile when he hears "Billboard" and shy clapping after 
Jimin turning around to talk to his friend with a smile
Tae's blank face and laughing only when he sees Hobi smiling♥
Hobi's head tilt and surprised happy face
Jin's quiet but HUGE smile, you can even see his happy eyes
Jungkook being cool for a moment before he starts smiling and clapping, but being very professional/collected all the time
And Namjoon, well... He looks at ARMY. Then he stands up, and he bows to ARMYs. 
And that my friend, is the reason why I can't begin to tell you how much I love and respect these hard working men.
I look up to you; please always be happy and healthy♥ and when you're not, we will be here for you.
